title: Melody Hans-on + Gitto
subtitle: Exploring data about animals with wikidata
description:
This data story explores the resources related to animals available on
Wikidata, the centralized, linked data repository for all Wikimedia projects, with the
goal of overviewing this topic from a statistical point of view.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (?wingslenght as ?count)
WHERE {
     ?bird wdt:P31 wd:Q16521 . 
     ?bird wdt:P171* wd:Q5113 .
     ?bird wdt:P2050 ?wingslenght . 
     ?bird wdt:P18 ?image .
     ?bird  p:P2050 ?statement .  
     ?statement  psv:P2050 ?valuenode.
     ?valuenode wikibase:quantityAmount ?temperature.
     ?valuenode wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit.
     FILTER( ?unit = wd:Q174728 )
          SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?bird rdfs:label         ?label.
      }

}
ORDER BY DESC(?wingslenght)
LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?pointLabel ?countryLabel ?lat ?long
WHERE {
?point wdt:P106 wd:Q350979 .
?point wdt:P27 ?country .
?country p:P625 ?statement .  
?statement psv:P625 ?node. ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat ; wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". } }
LIMIT 500
